user.title: Sensor setup
user.description:
This sensor uses official API to get [hourly pricing of electricity (Elering)](https://dashboard.elering.ee/assets/api-doc.html#/nps-controller/getPriceUsingGET).
For more precise explanation visit the [integration docs](https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/elering_hourly_pricing/).
